title: v3.8
message:
v3.8

Gave "Advanced Mode" a confirmation box with a warning explaining what it does, and the mode now enables the AI's thinking to modify its brain.

title: v3.7
message:
v3.7

Fixed crash from entering all spaces

title: v3.6
message:
v3.6

Implemented prioritization for higher frequency topic associations

title: v3.5a
message:
v3.5a

Fixed a few bugs that were causing crashes.

title: v3.5
message:
v3.5

Improved the multiple topic tracking and made the thinking logic incorporate multiple topics.

title: v3.5
message:
v3.5

Improved the multiple topic tracking and made the thinking logic incorporate multiple topics.

title: v3.4
message:
v3.4

Added multiple topic tracking.

title: v3.3
message:
v3.3

Fixed a bug that was causing a rare crash. The AI will also now change
the topic if it generates a response that contains only the topic word
itself, which happens if there's no data associated with the topic.

title: v3.2
message:
v3.2

Made the CleanMemory() function remove all empty files in the Brain
folder.

title: v3.1
message:
v3.1

Can enter input via soft keyboard instead of "Enter" button, and added
"Advanced Mode" menu option to toggle the AI only using procedural
response generation.

title: v3.0
message:
v3.0

Fixed a critical bug with the phrase generation algorithm.

title: v2.9
message:
v2.9

Created a screen with instructions for enabling the 'Storage' and 'Draw
over other apps' permissions when they're not enabled, instead of just
auto-exiting the app since people thought this was the app crashing.
Also improved the Discourage and procedural phrase generation functions
by enabling frequencies of pre/pro words to drop to 0 via Discouraging,
but not allowing the generation algorithm to use them when they're at 0.
The frequencies can still be raised via encouraging or responding.

title: v2.8a
message:
v2.8a

Fixed the frequencies for the pre/pro words getting reduced to 0, which
would cause them not to be found when the AI attempted to update them.

title: v2.8
message:
v2.8

Waiting for a new response no longer 'Discourages' the AI and it should
now maintain the topic, so the AI can now give "multiple responses".
Also fixed a bug with the Discouraging that would cause the pre/pro word
files to lose entries whose frequencies were reduced to 0... this lead
to the AI repeating a single word when it would attempt to generate a
response, since it would no longer find any words it learned to go
before/after the identified topic. Another bug that would cause pre/pro
word files to be needlessly created was also fixed.

title: v2.8
message:
v2.8

Implemented better topic tracking, and removed discouraging when waiting
for a new response.

title: v2.7c
message:
v2.7c

- Fixed a couple bugs with the data parsing

title: v2.7b
message:
v2.7b

- Fixed a bug with parsing the Words.txt file, which would cause the app
to crash when attempting to convert an empty result ("") into a number.

title: v2.7a
message:
v2.7a

- Fixed another bug with the permission checking

title: v2.7
message:
v2.7

Fixed some bugs with the permission checking

title: v2.6
message:
v2.6

- Updated the Tips to explain the Encourage/Discourage buttons and the
Set Delay menu option
- Fixed a bug that would allow quotes (and other special characters) to
be accepted within an input
- Modified the way the app checks for required permissions
- Gave the smiley face a slight delay before returning to a neutral
state

title: v2.5
message:
v2.5

- Added buttons to manually encourage/discourage phrase structuring

title: v2.4
message:
v2.4

- Added permission check for SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW

title: v2.3
message:
v2.3

- Added a "Tips" menu option to display tips for teaching the AI
(displays automatically when app starts)
- Re-organized the menu listing
- Renamed the "Word Fix" menu option to "Correct Spelling"

title: v2.2
message:
v2.2

Added a "Set Delay" menu option to change the amount of time before the
AI tries to initiate conversation itself (infinite = never try to
initiate conversation).

title: v2.1
message:
v2.1

- Made the "Enter" button change to a "Back" button when viewing
Thoughts or WordFix interface (for devices that don't have a back
button)

title: v2.0
message:
v2.0

- Removed the 100 line limit from the thought list
- Fixed the thought log being deleted upon exit

title: v1.9
message:
v1.9

- Overhauled/optimized most of the code structure
- Made 'thinking' a background process that runs continually
- Fixed the spelling correction menu overlaying the output text

title: v1.8
message:
v1.8

- Identified topic now gets saved with the output in
Data.saveOutput(String input)
- Data.getOutputList(String input) now excludes the topic line
- Added Data.getTopic(String input) method to extract only the saved
topic from a given input
- Data.pullInfo now does topic comparison to determine 'relevant' output
for the current topic
- Misc optimizations

- Tweaked the auto-scrolling

- Fixed being able to enter empty responses
- Fixed the Output window not auto-scrolling
